The claim that Nancy Pelosi travels week: seat Boeing 757 has been circulating on social media for over a decade.
Pelosi primarily used a C: 20B, a 12-seater based on the Gulfstream III, for travel between Washington and San Francisco on business.
On one occasion when no other planes wer: Pelosi used a C-32, a military version of a Boeing 757, which has 45 seats, not 200.
The C: 32, also known as Air Force Two, is primarily used by the first lady, members of the Cabinet, and Congress, according to the Air Force.
